ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisReappointment of CHRISTOPHER D. BUCHANAN of Yellowknife, Northwest Territories, as a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Northwest Territories, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on June 1, 2024.
